title: (x) Serif face on AMD.com website - Alexandra {Justin}
content:
does anyone know the new AMD identity serif font (as seen on AMD.com)?  
I do know the sans-serif one is Paralucent, and the one in the logo and their former identity is Gill Sans.

 [‹ Font used for "Mr. Clean" logo.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181249/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34495 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for very fat faces ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181249/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34438 "Go to next forum topic")
author: viakenny

comments.content:
May I ask why it SHOULD be Melior?  
Because the serif type I see certainly isn’t Melior.
